abstract: Forced to point the finger at just one of those two culprits, twice as many Americans chose Washington, according to a new Gallup poll.
snippet: Forced to point the finger at just one of those two culprits, twice as many Americans chose Washington, according to a new Gallup poll.
lead_paragraph: Americans blame the federal government more than they blame Wall Street for the nation's current economic distress, according to a new poll from Gallup. In fact, forced to declare j'accuse to just one culprit, twice as many chose the feds:

headline.main: Blaming Government More Than Wall Street
